duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct commercial property appraisals using state-of-the-art report writing software and custom-designed appraisal templates.
Utilize local and national publications and a national database for unique appraisal assignments.
Manage property database with appraiser-verified data for land sales, leases, improved sales, cap rates, and expense comparables.
Analyze appraiser-verified data and collaborate with research assistants to produce high-quality appraisal reports and advisory services.
Work remotely from home or in a professional office environment, offering flexibility in work location.
Possess at least five years of commercial appraisal experience and demonstrate exceptional attention to detail and written/verbal communication skills.
Enjoy a competitive compensation package and benefits including health, dental, vision plans, and a matching retirement program.
Be part of a well-respected appraisal company in Nevada with opportunities for professional growth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Real Estate, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
